name: Survivor Cells
description:
From life to death, our cells face countless battles, annihilating thousands of invading viruses and bacteria. Advance on this incredible journey and unlock new cells, medicines and nanotechnology to strengthen yourself in the greatest adventure a living being can face: life!



In Survivor Cells, agility is just the beginning to protect your cell from relentless attacks. You'll also need to make strategic decisions as you control your nanobot and upgrade your meds as you go. This is a casual and challenging game with elements of roguelite, bullet hell and tower defense, where survival is the key to victory!



In Survivor Cells, you'll:

- Face and defeat bacteria with devastating attacks and unique abilities;



- Advancing in the journey of life unlocks new cells with new special abilities;



- Use nanotechnology and control nanobots to destroy viruses and bacteria;



- You can use medicines to increase your power to destroy viruses and your defense;



- Face different viruses and bacteria with different characteristics and abilities;



- Face super bacteria “Boss” with special abilities;



And much more…



COMMUNITY
We are a small studio working hard to make our games as fun as possible!
If you want to follow the development and participate in future game tests, follow the studio's page on Steam and join our Discord.
